meanings.definition: Below the maximum level or capacity.
meanings.sent1: She only did a submaximal workout today.
meanings.sent2: The submaximal speed of the car made the journey longer.
meanings.sent3: His submaximal attempt at juggling ended in a few dropped balls.
meanings.sent4: The submaximal light in the room created a cozy atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The submaximal volume of the music was perfect for background noise.

meanings.definition: Less than the highest possible intensity or effort.
meanings.sent1: He performed submaximal lifts to avoid injury.
meanings.sent2: The submaximal enthusiasm of the crowd was evident.
meanings.sent3: The submaximal amount of toppings on the pizza left him wanting more.
meanings.sent4: Her submaximal energy levels made her feel tired all day.
meanings.sent5: The submaximal temperature of the pool was refreshing on a hot day.
